docs.text: Dataget Dataget is an easy to use, framework agnostic dataset library that gives you quick access to a collection of Machine Learning datasets through a simple API. Minimal : Downloads entire datasets with just 1 line of code. Compatible : Loads data as Pandas Dataframes which can be easily used with the majority of Machine Learning frameworks. Transparent : By default stores data in your current project so you can easily inspect it. Kaggle Integration : Supports loading Kaggle Datasets in a variety of formats. Getting Started import dataget as dg # Downloads MNIST from http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/ # and loads it into memory as pandas dataframes. df_train , df_test = dg . data ( "mnist" ) . get () Installation pip install dataget
docs.title: Dataget
